name: 萌えっ娘タッチ４！！
summary:
かわいい狐の妖怪コンちゃんが恩返しにやってきた！
あなたの指で直接触ってコンちゃんをよろこばそう！

タッチすると揺れて甘い声が出ちゃいます。
ちゃんとタッチしないと怒られちゃうぞ！
さらにマジックハンドを使うと・・・。

エクストラステージ付き
(adobe air)
--
Have made her pleased to touch directly by your finger!
with bud voice
A fox's apparition lovely "KON" came to repaying the kindness.
Have made her pleased to touch directly by your finger!

Shake and touch her, and a sweet voice is raised. 
She will be angry that you do not touch neatly. 
In addition, when you use the magic hand...

With extra stage
(adobe air)
